title: Textile, 1900–1950
medium:
Medium: silk, silver on paper
Technique: stenciled resist on brocade
description: Vertical panel on pale gray silk with a narrower panel of dark blue on the right-hand side containing a high breaking wave and smaller wave in shades of paler blue and white. Vertical cartouche reserved in upper right-hand corner contains three character signature in black ink. Scattered dots of paper silver on waves. Horizontal section of cloth weave alternate with openwork strip formed by twisted warps.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1900–1950.Medium: silk, silver on paper
Technique: stenciled resist on brocade. 1950-63-1.
